articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Friday hosted a reception to mark the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there on invitation were members of the military attaches corps here and foreign diplomatic envoys.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other generals and officers of the KPA were on hand.

articles.title: North Phyongan, North Hamgyong Provincial, Nampho City Conferences of WPK Take Place
articles.content:
North Phyongan, North Hamgyong Provincial, Nampho City Conferences of WPK Take Place
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The North Phyongan, North Hamgyong Provincial and Nampho City Conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on the spot.
					 The conferences were attended by delegates elected by the party organizations at all levels in the provinces.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences elected their executives.
					
					 They reviewed the work done by the provincial party committees.
					
					 Kim Nung O, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jon Sung Hun, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Kang Yang Mo, chief secretary of the Nampho City Committee of the WPK, made reports.
					
					 The conferences unanimously called on party organizations at all levels to conduct ceaseless political and ideological work to give full play to the mental power of the party members and other working people all out in the day-and-night 70-day campaign and thus significantly greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK with the honor of being victors.
					
					 They discussed and decided the tasks for enhancing the militant function and role of party organizations to thoroughly establish the party's monolithic leadership system and make great innovations and leap forward in all fields and units.
					
					 The conferences reviewed the work of the provincial party auditing commissions and elected the leadership bodies of the provincial party committees.
					
					 There took place the election of delegates and nomination of observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The conferences courteously proposed to elect Marshal Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Decisions on electing Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were adopted at the conferences with a unanimous approval.
					
					 The delegates and observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were elected and nominated at the conferences.

articles.title: Chairman of C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society Notifies South Side of Decision to Send Families of Abductees to Seoul
articles.content:
Chairman of C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society Notifies South Side of Decision to Send Families of Abductees to Seoul
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Chung Bok, chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society, on Friday sent the following notice to the president of the south Korean Red Cross in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet group is keeping in custody the DPRK citizens after luring and abducting them:
					 As already disclosed, gangsters of the Intelligence Service of your side abducted citizens of the DPRK to the area of your side in the most base and barbarous manner in broad daylight in conspiracy with brokers in China.
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities of your side keep the above-said citizens in custody against their will, talking about "a group defection" and "free will", and flatly turned down even the just demand of the DPRK for their repatriation. This cannot be construed otherwise than an unpardonable unethical behavior and insult to noble humanitarianism.
					
					 Our side hears that the authorities of your side are busy conducting against the abductees appeasement, hypocritical and "defection" operations baffling human imagination.
					
					 These practices are adding to the most brutal and unethical crimes besides the abduction by the authorities of your side including Chongwadae and the "Intelligence Service". 
					
					 Your Red Cross should no longer overlook this deplorable situation as its mission is to work for humanitarianism.
					
					 The families of the abductees are eagerly asking for face-to-face contact with their daughters as they were forced to part from the beloved daughters.
					
					 At their earnest requests our side again seriously notifies your side of our decision to send them to Seoul via Panmunjom.
					
					 Your side should not conceal the unethical crime under such absurd pretext as "international practice", but take immediate technical measures so that they may go to Seoul via Panmunjom to have face-to-face meeting with their daughters.

articles.title: GFTUK Spokesman Urges S. Korea to Send Back to DPRK Workers Abducted
articles.content:
GFTUK Spokesman Urges S. Korea to Send Back to DPRK Workers Abducted
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) in a statement on Friday denounced the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for mobilizing the gangsters of the "Intelligence Service" to let them commit the thrice-cursed crime of alluring and abducting in group the woman workers who were working at an overseas restaurant.
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The shameless and unethical criminal act is a product of the foolish ambition and the heinous policy of escalating confrontation with the DPRK pursued by the Park Geun Hye group to undermine the single-minded unity of the DPRK and realize the ambition for "unification of social systems".
					
					  The recent gangster-like act of abducting the women of the DPRK working overseas after reaching dark tentacles to them proves that traitor Park Geun Hye's confrontation-minded paranoia has already gone beyond the danger line as it was the most vicious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement vehemently denounces in the name of all the workers in the northern half of Korea the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who allured and abducted in group the women workers of the DPRK in broad daylight and strongly demanded the Park group to send them back unconditionally and immediately.
					
					 If the Park group wants to prolong its remaining days, it has to apologize before the nation for the group abduction of those women of the DPRK, send them back immediately and unconditionally and sternly punish those who were involved in the abduction and those who manipulated it backstage, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Women Meet with DPRK Hero
articles.content:
Women Meet with DPRK Hero
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the women's union had a meeting with DPRK hero Kim Sung Un on Friday at the People's Palace of Culture in the run-up to the 84th anniversary of founding of the Korean People's Army.
					  Present at the meeting were Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, officials and members of the women's union here.
					
					 Hero Kim, lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, addressed that the freedom and sovereignty of the country were honorably defended in the Fatherland Liberation War as the service personnel and people of the DPRK beat back the gangster-like U.S. imperialists that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, thanks to the Juche-oriented military idea, superb war methods and strategies indicated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the days of the war, the President traveled to the forefront area and taught the fighters the Juche-oriented and original war methods suited to the terrain conditions of the country, the weaponry of the People's Army and modern war, he said.
					
					 He recalled he shot down five jets of the enemy within 20 odd days through the aircraft-hunting team movement initiated by the President and had the honor to receive the title of DPRK hero.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the exploits the great leaders performed by leading the war to victory and leading the Songun revolution, the hero added.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
 Kangso, April 22 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by agricultural workers at the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District on April 22 to mark the 84th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 The art squad of the C.C. of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and members of the art group of the farm put on the stage such colorful numbers as female solo and pangchang "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung", poem and chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" and mixed chorus "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms".
					
					 The performers praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for creating a shining model in building the revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence with their original military idea and extraordinary commanding art and turning the DPRK into a military power in the world.
					
					 They impressively represented the ardent reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is consolidating the self-defensive capability a thousand-fold and firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation by pursuing the invincible Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers showing the patriotic enthusiasm of the agricultural workers who are determined to firmly defend the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Friday.

articles.title: Indonesian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Indonesian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, Friday hosted a reception on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Officials of the Indonesian embassy here attended it.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Delegation Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Delegation Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Yun Jong Gwan, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where historic data and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae are displayed.
					
					 At the President's old home in Mangyongdae they looked round historic relics preserved there with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President.
					
					 At the end of the visit Yun Jong Gwan said:
					
					 Visiting Mangyongdae, I miss the President very much as he devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 We will as ever remain loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, etc.

articles.title: "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 10 Published
articles.content:
"Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 10 Published 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 10, a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published in the DPRK.
					 The book has four chapters which deal with the revolutionary anecdotes of President Kim Il Sung in the period of leading the building of a new country from January to September, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 Chapter 37 carries anecdotes telling stories that he visited the security officers training centres across the country on the eve of the proclamation of the founding of the regular armed forces in order to let service personnel know about the significance of building the regular armed forces and personally guided the work of producing posters about a military parade and making the colors of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The book relates stories that he went to the Kanggye area to learn about the living conditions of people in the remote mountain area and took care of study and life of the children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School as their real father would do.
					
					 Chapter 38 carries anecdotes telling stories that he proposed the joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in north and south of Korea to cope with the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to keep the country divided forever, exerted a lot of efforts for the success of the conference and showed loving care for the patriots from south Korea. 
					
					 Chapter 39 deals with anecdotes about facts that he visited every part of the country to  firmly consolidate the democratic base of new Korea and those dealing with loving care shown by him for bolstering up the naval force of the country and his devoted efforts made for modernizing Nampho Port.
					
					 Chapter 40 carries anecdotes telling about the exploits he performed by working hard to establish a unified government of Korea and found the Republic.

articles.title: World and National Records Renewed
articles.content:
World and National Records Renewed
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A series of good results has been witnessed in the ongoing Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games.
					 According to an official of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, new records were made in shooting, archery and weightlifting events.
					
					 Shooters from the Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army set a new record in the men's team 10 meter running target event with 1 738 points (the world record set in the 48th World Shooting Championship stands at 1 733 points and domestic record in the 2014 DPRK Championships 1 731 points).
					
					 They also renewed the domestic record, which was made at the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize two years ago, in the men's team 10 meter running mixed event.
					
					 Domestic records were also bettered in the men's individual 70-meter archery and men's 85kg and 94kg categories of weightlifting.
					
					 Meanwhile, the first round of the premier football league for the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games came to a close on Thursday, in which April 25 Sport Team and Pyongyang Sport Team took the first place in the men's and women's events respectively.

articles.title: Sinchon Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Sinchon Museum Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Sinchon, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Sinchon Museum, the place bearing witness to the U.S. imperialists' monstrous atrocities, drew service personnel of the Korean People's Army, at least 85 000 people from all walks of life and youth and students from more than 1 000 units in recent two months.
					 The U.S. imperialists and class enemies killed more than 35 000 people or a quarter of the then population in Sinchon County in the period of the strategic temporary retreat in the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Looking round the tomb of 400 mothers, the tomb of 102 children and other places of the museum, the visitors keenly realized that the U.S. imperialists and class enemies were the group of cannibals regarding massacre of human beings as their pleasure.
					
					 At the end of the visits the service personnel held meetings to vow to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists and class enemies with arms without fail.
					
					 People from all walks of life are determined to dynamically bring about fresh miracles and innovations in every scene of the 70-day campaign of loyalty in the spirit of dealing sledge hammer blows at the enemies running amuck to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The visits of service personnel and people to the museum go on.

articles.title: Phyongnam Irrigation Gravity-fed Waterway in DPRK
articles.content:
Phyongnam Irrigation Gravity-fed Waterway in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A project for Chongchongang-Phyongnam irrigation gravity-fed waterway is progressing apace in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The completion of this project will help raise the water level of the Lake Yonphung and supply enough water to the Yoldusamcholli Plain with tens of thousands of hectares of farm fields as well as to industrial establishments in the area.
					
					 The Phyongnam irrigation is associated with the undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated a large-scale project for the Phyongnam irrigation in September Juche 37 (1948) after Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule. And he indicated the orientation and ways for the successful project on the spot.
					
					 After the Korean War (1950-1953), he saw to it that nation-wide efforts were concentrated on the interrupted project. When the project was completed, he came to the spot and named the reservoir "Lake Yonphung" meaning that the Yoldusamcholli Plain enjoys a rich harvest every year.
					
					 Later, under leader Kim Jong Il's far-reaching plan for grand nature remaking, the Kaechon-Lake Thaesong Waterway project was carried out to put the Phyongnam irrigation on a gravity-fed system, saving many pumping facilities and power.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un advanced the task for building the Chongchongang-Phyongnam irrigation gravity-fed waterway to give full play to the vitality of the Phyongnam irrigation and took all necessary measures for the project.

articles.title: Universal, Free Medical Care in DPRK
articles.content:
Universal, Free Medical Care in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Han Son Il, a worker in Kangdong County of Pyongyang, was saved from the verge of death by medical workers of Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University.
					 I got reborn thanks to the loving care of the socialist system under which human being is the most valuable and everything serves the people, he said, adding: I express my profound gratitude to medical workers for devoting their all for my recovery and to the Workers' Party of Korea for establishing such excellent medical care system.
					
					 It was in the arduous period of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) that the DPRK government put into practice the decision on the enforcement of the free medical services. Later, it stipulated in the Socialist Constitution that any DPRK citizen has the right to free medical care.
					
					 Thanks to the regular health system set up from the capital city to localities, anyone in the DPRK can receive equal and free medical treatment, irrespective of his or her age, residential area and job.
					
					 In recent years alone, a telemedicine system was established throughout the country to give rapid assistance to patients. 
					
					 Therefore, even foreigners say the universal, free medical care in the DPRK is the most advantageous one, the one and only model, in the world.

articles.title: Coal Output Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Coal output has increased in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea after the start of the 70-day campaign.
					 According to data available at the Ministry of Coal Industry, the production plan for the campaign was carried out at 101 percent as of April 20.
					
					The Sunchon Area Youth Coal-mining Complex produced 98,000 more tons of coal than the schedule.
					
					 Coal-mining complexes in Hamnam, Chonnae and Kangdong over-fulfilled their production plan, each by 34, 18 and 12 percent.
					
					 Also, signal achievements have been made in the coal mine construction.
					
					 Coal mines in the western area of the country developed new pits, each with hundreds of thousands of tons of capacity, and furnished them with belt-conveyor, winch and all other kinds of equipment.
					
					 Meanwhile, Tukjang, Tokchon, Sunchon and Songnam coal-mining machine factories and the Unsan Coal-mining Equipment Parts Plant supplied many tubs, equipment parts and small tools to coal mines.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Carrying Forward Cause of National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il for Carrying Forward Cause of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The life of leader Kim Jong Il was the noblest one of the peerless patriot who devoted his all to the work for carrying out the wishes of President Kim Il Sung, regarding the President's will for national reunification as his faith and will, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il declared his steadfast will to fully implement the President's behests for national reunification without an inch of deflection and formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo reflecting lifelong efforts, exploits and noble patriotism of the President for reunification as the three charters for national reunification. Then he called upon all Koreans to turn out in the nationwide drive for implementing the behests of the President for national reunification.
					
					 After the great loss of the nation in the 1990s, the history of the President's leadership for national reunification was carried forward and the movement for reunification faced a fresh period of upsurge. This would be unthinkable without the efforts of Kim Jong Il who instilled the three charters of national reunification, precious patriotic legacy of the President, into the minds of Koreans as strong mainstay of independent reunification.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification ushered in 2000 by Kim Jong Il is the valuable crystal of his patriotism for achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of our nation true to the behests of the President.
					
					 It is the noteworthy exploit Kim Jong Il performed for the country and the nation that he developed the movement for national reunification into the patriotic movement for national independence and national unity and thus laid the strong foundation for independent reunification, true to the behests of the President.

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A military drill to "cope with the provocation of a local war" was staged from April 18 to 20 on the Thaean peninsula, south Korea under the supervision of the Operation Command No. 2 of the puppet Army, according to Yonhap News and KBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported to be the largest-ever rehearsal for coping with "a local war" as it involved thousands of troops belonging to 27 units of ground, naval and air forces, 19 helicopters, more than 350 vehicles, reconnaissance planes, patrol planes and patrol craft.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean air forces started the Max Thunder from April 15.
					
					 More than 90 jets including FA-18, F-15K and KF-16 were busy with day and night drills under the simulated conditions of striking areas of the north.

articles.title: Online Paper Deplores Media Crisis in South Korea
articles.content:
Online Paper Deplores Media Crisis in South Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- An editorial disclosing the worst media crisis of south Korea was posted on the south Korean online paper Voice of People on April 21.
					 The editorial deplored south Korea having the worst records in the indices of freedom of speech as was made public by the Reporters Without Borders.
					
					 This is another shameful record but not so surprising in the light of what has been done under the Park Geun Hye regime, editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The regime is to blame for the worst crisis in the freedom of speech and the media should be held accountable for it as the conservative media are reduced to a political force, away from their mission to report fact.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionist Praises Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionist Praises Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A priest of the Samyang Church in Ryangsan City, South Kyongsang Province, south Korea posted articles praising the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on website, according to the south Korean on-line paper Voice of People on April 20.
					 He was attracted by the personality and noble popular traits of the peerlessly great men and came to know better about the reality of the DPRK dignified with independence through data posted on websites.
					
					 Acting as core member of operation camp of the website "Provisional cyber national defence command", he posted his own poem praising leader Kim Jong Il and articles including "General Kim Jong Un's leadership comes with the explosive weight", "The world should look up to Kim Jong Un's Korea" on website.
					
					 And he posted at least 80 articles including those praising the Juche idea and the Songun politics.
					
					 When the puppet court authorities sentenced him to jail on charges of violation of the fascist law, he protested saying that the "security law is a law opposing freedom of expression and it is a thing going against the era to define the north as an anti-state organization."

articles.title: Park Geun Hye of South Korea Censured by Public
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye of South Korea Censured by Public
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- S. Koreans from all walks of life are becoming increasingly critical of traitor Park Geun Hye for feeling no guilty about the ruling party's defeat in the "National Assembly" election.
					 Park chaired a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae after the election on April 18, where she went so ridiculous as to say that she hoped the 20th "National Assembly" would be the one striving to promote people's living, instead of repenting of the ruling party's heavy defeat in the election.
					
					 Commenting on her remarks, the spokesman for the opposition Dobulo Democratic Party, said everybody expected something from Park's speech as it was the first of its kind after the election but no word of reflection was found in her remarks.
					
					 Nothing has changed in the "president's" thought and it seems she didn't want to change her thought despite the stern and severe punishment by the people, the spokesman added.
					
					 The spokesman for the Party of People commented that the "president's" bad understanding of the people was proved through the election.
					
					 Cooperation at "the National Assembly" and economic recovery would be impossible unless she reflects on her wrongs and changes her mind, the spokesman added.
					
					 The on-line newspaper Asian Economy blamed her for failing to reflect on the heavy defeat in the election.
					
					 Park's support rate is the lowest-ever since she took power and there is high possibility of making political landscape complicated due to the thinking faculty of the "president" that falls short of the public expectation.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Denounced for Discriminating against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Denounced for Discriminating against Korean Schools
 Tokyo, April 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the Japanese education hall in Tokyo on April 20 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' discrimination against Korean schools. It was co-sponsored by all Korean schools and the mothers' society of Koreans schools in Kanto area, the students committees of Korean middle and high schools in Tokyo and Kanagawa and the liaison society of Korean high school graduates.
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its organizations, officials under the Chongryon headquarters and parents of students in Kanto area and students of Korean University and Korean high school.
					
					 Sin Kil Ung, principal of Korean Middle and High School in Tokyo, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on March 29 sent notices to governors of prefectures where Korean schools are situated, the reporter said, adding this is an extreme political discriminating measure against Korean schools and their students.
					
					 The UN Committee on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination strongly demanded the Japanese government and the above-said ministry lift the discriminating measure at once, the reporter noted.
					
					 Speakers renewed the will to decisively shatter the Japanese authorities' moves for obliterating national education and protect Korean schools.
					
					 The participants heard a lawyer's explanation about the injustice of the notice of the ministry.
					
					 Japanese personages made solidarity speeches.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, students of Korean University, officials of Chongryon and parents of students in Kanto area, students of Korean high school and members of Japanese solidarity organizations staged a protest action outside the ministry.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Swedish Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Swedish Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the validity of the fresh strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth by the WPK and its intention.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Belarus
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" was brought out in booklet by the Belarusian Mezisond Publishing House.
					 The work, published on February 26, Juche 104 (2015), indicates the tasks and ways for covering the mountains of the country with green woods by conducting a vigorous forest restoration campaign involving the entire party, the whole army and all the people.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Bodies
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Foreign bodies posted on their websites special write-ups from March 30 to April 2 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il posted on its website articles titled "Kim Il Sung, great man of the century" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The articles gave a detailed account of his exploits, saying that he is being revered by the world progressive people as the eternal sun.
					
					 They referred to what famous foreign figures who admired his noble traits told about him.
					
					 The Agence Congolaise d'Information featured the articles titled "Sunny smile" and "DPRK is full-fledged space power" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun".
					
					 A Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) posted an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and a Japanese" telling the story that he met a Japanese media person and showed warm loving care for him.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given at the Guinean Guyco Company on April 9 to observe the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Speakers at the lecture said that Kim Jong Il achieved the great exploits to be eternally recorded in history with his original Songun politics.
					
					 They noted that the KPA has always emerged victorious under the leadership of the outstanding commanders of Songun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Kyrgyzstan, Belarus, China
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Kyrgyzstan, Belarus, China
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Kyrgyzstan, Belarus and China from April 11 to 15 to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meetings were figures of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, Kyrgyzstan Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, National Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice", Belarus Association for the Study of Juche Idea, Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China, Jindalle Children's Foundation and the Arab Information Center in China and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Kyrgyzstan Group for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader of not only the Korean people but also the world people.
					
					 The chairman of the Belarus Association for the Study of Juche Idea lauded Kim Il Sung as the benevolent father of the people who built a socialist country centered on the popular masses for the first time in Korea, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 The executive chairman of the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China said that Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in his early years and unsparingly supported the Chinese people in their war for liberating Northeast China in the latter half of the 1940s.
					
					 The chairman of the Arab Information Center in China stressed that Kim Il Sung is the prominent leader and the founding father of socialist Korea who devoted his all to the country's liberation and the cause of building the country, adding that the Korean people glorified the 20th century with victories and glory under his leadership.
					
					 A congratulatory message and letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Kyrgyzstan and China.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place in the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia and the Milenia Armada Express Company of Indonesia between April 8 and 11 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia said that Kim Il Sung is a hero of the nation and invincible and iron-willed commander who liberated the country and protected sovereignty of the DPRK after defeating the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Kim Il Sung built the people-centered socialist country, powerful country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, from scratch after the war, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia praised the President and leader Kim Jong Il for making a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, holding aloft the banner of independence and Songun.
					
					 The manager of the Milenia Armada Express Company of Indonesia said that the President, who was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, performed immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in Cuba, Laos, Britain and Ecuador from April 7 to 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead forward the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Eternal Treasures in Praise of the Great Men" and "Newly-Built Structures".
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of liberating the country and led to victory the three year-long war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He praised Kim Il Sung for turning the DPRK into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence by wisely leading the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist revolution and thus making an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxis-Leninist), lauded Kim Il Sung as the great revolutionary and invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation.
					
					 Milton Burbano Bohorquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, stressed that Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and world progressive people for his exploits.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Russia, Vietnam, Mongolia, Laos, Nepal, Cambodia, Iran, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Malaysia, Brazil and Peru from April 5 to 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of book and photo exhibitions were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to usher in a heyday in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Kimilsungia, Flower of Sun" and "Arms of Korea."
					
					 Present at the events on invitation were personages of governments, political parties, organizations and institutions, delegates of Juche idea study organizations and representatives of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in relevant countries and foreign diplomatic envoys, staff members of the DPRK missions were on hand.
					
					 A deputy prime minister of the Khabarovsk Territorial Administration of Russia and the first deputy secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party who is member of the legislative council of the territory said that Kim Il Sung laid a solid foundation for the independent development of the country and its prosperity.
					
					 The leader of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) who is former prime minister praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man recognized and boundlessly revered not only by the Nepali people but the whole world.
					
					 The deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia lauded Kim Il Sung as a peerlessly great man who turned the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 The deputy commander of the Iranian Army extended invariable support to the army and people of the DPRK in their staunch anti-U.S. struggle.

articles.title: German Body Introduces Ryomyong Street under Construction in Pyongyang
articles.content:
German Body Introduces Ryomyong Street under Construction in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website on April 6 an article titled "New street to demonstrate the might of Songun Korea", illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 He declared the construction of Ryomyong Street and set forth important tasks to be carried out for the construction, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The construction does not simply mean formation of a street but would mark a political occasion of displaying the spirit of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the world despite the U.S. imperialists and their followers' sanctions and pressure, the spirit of the DPRK working hard to translate its people's supreme ideal into reality.
					
					 The new street for people will be built in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un at a time when the cities of the U.S. and the West have turned into scenes of corruption and cities ridden with terror due to violence, products of the authorities' incompetence and indifference.
					
					 The declaration of the construction of Ryomyong Street amounts to a bold measure of slapping daydreamers and reptile buglers of the U.S. and the West on their faces as they spread the fiction of "collapse of north Korea".
					
					 The DPRK where the leader, party and masses are single-mindedly united will never collapse.
					
					 The Korean people will complete the street within this year to demonstrate to the whole world the might of the DPRK advancing by dint of self-development and self-reliance while frustrating desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group of south Korea.

articles.title: Japanese Personage Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Japanese Personage Blames U.S. for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, posted on its website on April 4 an article disclosing the true nature of the U.S. as the chief criminal escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					 The article introduced in detail the fact that a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement on March 31 denounced the U.S. for making a foolish bid to shift the blame for the tense situation on the peninsula on to the DPRK.
					
					 Raising such question as to how the nuclear issue spawned on the Korean peninsula, the article referred to the U.S. introduction of lots of nuclear weapons into south Korea after the Korean war.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. posed ceaseless nuclear threat to the DPRK, non-nuclear state.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes was attributable to the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 It chose the road of emerging as a nuclear weapons state to protect the sovereignty and vital rights of the country and nation from the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 Its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is for building a thriving nation, defending the country and nation from the U.S. nuclear attack and safeguarding peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. tightened nuclear threat, military pressure and sanctions on the DPRK would compel the latter to bolster its nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de respuesta al Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Le expreso profundo agradecimiento por haberme enviado un mensaje de felicitacion lleno de sentimiento de mucha admiracion al camarada Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de nuestra Republica, con motivo del 104o aniversario de su natalicio.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad para reafirmar nuestra voluntad de fortalecer y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con Siria en acato al proposito del gran companero Kim Il Sung, deseo a usted y a su pueblo arabe siriaco la mayor victoria en su lucha por rechazar la agresion y el terrorismo de las fuerzas hostiles y defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente lao
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente lao
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith, electo en el primer periodo de sesiones de la VIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Nacional de Laos como presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					El remitente le expresa la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises preparadas por los Lideres antepasados, se consolidaran y se desarrollaran continuamente tambien en el futuro y formula votos de todo corazon por la salud del destinatario y grandes exitos en su trabajo responsable para construir un pais prospero.

articles.title: MINFAP ofrece banquete con motivo de 84o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
articles.content:
MINFAP ofrece banquete con motivo de 84o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares ofrecio el dia 22 un banquete con motivo del 84o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					Fueron invitados los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y otros generales y oficiales del EPC. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.

articles.title: Efectuadas conferencias provinciales de PTC
articles.content:
Efectuadas conferencias provinciales de PTC
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las conferencias de las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur, de Hwanghae del Norte y de la Ciudad de Rason del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En las ocasiones tomaron parte los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones partidistas a distintos niveles en las provincias.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En las conferencias se eligieron las presidencias.
					
					Los conclaves hicieron balance del trabajo de los Comites Provinciales del Partido.
					
					Thae Jong Su, Pak Thae Dok y Rim Kyong Man, secretarios jefes de los Comites del Partido en las Provincias de Hamgyong del Sur, de Hwanghae del Norte y de la Ciudad de Rason presentaron informes de balance del trabajo en las respectivas conferencias.
					
					En las ocasiones hubo discursos y fueron debatidas y determinadas las tareas para consolidar mas las organizaciones partidistas y elevar su funcion y papel, conforme a la exigencia de la epoca de salto para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Se realizaron balances del trabajo de las Comisiones Revisoras Provinciales del Partido.
					
					Tambien, se eligieron los organos directivos de los Comites Provinciales del PTC.
					
					Y se efectuaron los trabajos de eleccion de los delegados y los observadores para el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Hubo discursos que propusieron cortesmente elegir al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Los oradores expusieron decisiones de luchar vigorosamente por unico camino de la revolucion jucheana confiando y siguiendo absolutamente en el Mariscal.
					
					En los conclaves fue adoptada por unanimidad la resolucion por el respecto.
					
					Y fueron electos los delegados y encomendados los observadores al VII del Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: MINREX condena campana chovinista nacional de reaccionarios derechistas japoneses
articles.content:
MINREX condena campana chovinista nacional de reaccionarios derechistas japoneses
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- Despues del reciente terremoto de gran tamano producido en la zona de Kumamoto de Kyushu de Japon, se perpetran de manera abierta y siniestra las maquinaciones chovinistas nacionales de las fuerzas reaccionarias derechistas de Japon contra los coreanos.
					En Internet se inserta el articulo absurdo de que el coreano echo el veneno en el pozo y circulan publicamente los rumores falsos para inculcar la extremada hostilidad y repugnancia nacionales incluyendo los consejos de estar alerta por la rebelion de coreanos.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion senalando que esto testimonia que todavia existe la fantasma de militarismo japones que en el pasado obligo a la nacion coreana el destino de esclavos coloniales y le dio todo tipo de desgracias, y deviene una burla imperdonable y abierta hostilidad contra la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y la RPDC.
					
					Las locuras de reaccionarios derechistas contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon es el producto directo de la frenetica politica hostil anti-RPDC del poder de Abe que se engendro de las maniobras del gobierno japones contra la RPDC y la Chongryon, subraya el documento.
					
					Exige a las autoridades japonesas cesar de inmediato las viles maniobras contra la RPDC y la Chongryon y abandonar los actos de promover y tolerar la violacion a la dignidad y los derechos humanos de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					El documento dio enfasis en que si Japon no presta atencion a nuestra advertencia, asumiran toda la responsabilidad de las consecuencias graves.

articles.title: MPTA de RPDC condena intento de incendio forestal de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
MPTA de RPDC condena intento de incendio forestal de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental (MPTA) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 21 una declaracion condenando a la banda titere surcoreana que cometio perversos actos criminales para lanzar a nuestra zona forestal los aparatos de automatico incendio.
					Recientemente fueron descubiertos en la zona del monte Kumgang inclusive las comunas Namae y Onjong del distrito Kosong de la provincia de Kangwon y la zona de la comuna Hanwol del distrito Anak de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur los globos que contienen materias inflamables, relevador de tiempo y aparatos detonantes electricos.
					
					Segun la investigacion de nuestro organo especializado, estos aparatos fueron lanzados por la banda titere para causar incendio en cualquier lugar de nuestra region en un tiempo fijado.
					
					Esto comprueba que la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida e insatisfecha con el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC, se desespera para causar a la RPDC inmensas perdidas materiales y calamidad ambiental, asi senala el documento y condena como sigue:
					
					Lo que la banda titere lanza a ciegas hacia la zona de nuestra parte los generadores de incendio forestal deviene aviesa maquinacion provocativa y archi-crimen encaminados a impedir la campana por la restauracion forestal de todo el Estado y pueblo y poner obstaculos en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Ni siquiera los gobernadores surcoreanos antecedentes se atrevieron a incendiar en el tiempo pacifico nuestra tierra, base de vida de la nacion.
					
					Las malignas y viles locuras criminales de la banda traidora centuplican la colera y la indignacion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					Si la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye sigue recurriendo a la provocacion sucia de incendio forestal, le caera nuestra dura contramedida correspondiente.

articles.title: Presidente de CC de ACRC emite nota de aviso a parte surcoreana
articles.content:
Presidente de CC de ACRC emite nota de aviso a parte surcoreana
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la banda de los titeres surcoreanos tento, secuestro y detuvo a los ciudadanos norcoreanos, el presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Chung Bok, envio el dia 22 una nota de aviso como sigue:
					  Como ya esta reconocido, los gangsteres del "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" (SNI) de vuestra parte secuestraron a la luz del dia con el mas vil y bestial metodo a nuestros ciudadanos y los llevaron a vuestra zona en contubernio con los intermediarios del terreno chino.
					
					  Sin embargo, las autoridades de vuestra parte detienen por la fuerza a nuestros ciudadanos so pretexto de la "fuga colectiva del Norte" y la "voluntad libre" y niegan totalmente hasta nuestra demanda justa de devolverlos. Por lo tanto no podemos menos de considerarlo como intolerable acto anti-etico e insulto al noble humanitarismo.
					
					  Para colmo, siguen llegando a nuestra parte los datos de que las autoridades de vuestra parte libran atrozmente los trabajos para el adormecimiento, el engano y la "sumision" inimaginables e intolerables contra nuestros ciudadanos raptados.
					
					  Las autoridades de vuestra parte incluyendo los miembros de Chongwadae y el SNI cometen el doble y triple crimenes mas bestiales y antieticos ademas del crimen de raptar a la luz del dia a nuestros ciudadanos.
					
					  Vuestra sociedad que tiene el humanitarismo como su mision no debera dar espaldas a tal realidad tragica.
					
					  Ahora, nuestros familiares separados forzosamente de sus hijos amantes piden vehementemente entrevistarse con sus hijos.
					
					  Al respecto, volvemos a avisar con seriedad que nuestra parte decidio enviar a los familiares a Seul a traves de Phanmunjom de acuerdo con sus peticiones ardientes.
					
					  Vuestra parte debera tomar de inmediato las medidas practicas para que los familiares de nuestra parte se encuentren con ellas en Seul a traves de Phanmunjom de acuerdo con el principio humanitario de la cruzo roja en vez de ocultar tal criminalidad anti-etica so pretexto injusto como las "costumbres internacionales".
